messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is unique about most humans' ability to distinguish between advanced scientific equipment and Mythos artifacts?
Most humans would be unable to tell the difference between a piece of advanced scientific equipment and a magical Mythos artifact.
You are a helpful assistant.
How advanced are the mi-go technologically compared to Earth?
The mi-go are technologically several hundred years beyond that of Earth.
You are a helpful assistant.
What motivated the mi-go to come to Earth?
The mi-go originally came to Earth to steal certain minerals they could not find on their own worlds.
You are a helpful assistant.
What types of technology do the mi-go primarily use on Earth?
Most technology that the mi-go have brought to Earth relates to mining or to war.
You are a helpful assistant.
What initially brought the mi-go to Earth?
to steal certain minerals
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of technology does the mi-go relate to war?
mining or to war
You are a helpful assistant.
What was created by the mi-go from a Seed of Azathoth?
a larval Great Old One, Ghadamon
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of gates were constructed by the mi-go?
a network of magical gates
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of technology do most mi-go technology relate to on Earth?
mining or to war
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Shining Trapezohedron used for?
a peculiar power over an aspect of Nyarlathotep
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a remarkable medical technique demonstrated by the mi-go?
remove a human brain from its body and preserve it for thousands of years, totally functional
You are a helpful assistant.
What advanced knowledge does the mi-go possess in medical and surgical techniques?
many surgical techniques that humans would consider miraculous
You are a helpful assistant.
What can Mi-go do with a human brain?
They can remove a human brain from its body and preserve it for thousands of years, totally functional.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of Bio-Web Armor?
It provides 8 points of armor against blows, flame, electricity, etc. in dangerous situations.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a human wearing Bio-Web Armor?
A human wearing Bio-Web Armor will take 1 point of damage each time the armor is removed, as hair and flesh is ripped away.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do Mi-go guard their technology?
They will pursue anyone foolish enough to steal their technology.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the armor points of the harnesses?
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the bio-web armor when it is removed?
1 point of damage as hair and flesh is ripped away
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the bio-web armor when it has no protection left?
Disintegrates into a steaming, sticky pool of viscous matter
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of large doses of Black Lotus Powder?
Reduces those taking it to insane, driveling idiots
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the armor when no armor points remain?
The armor disintegrates into a steaming, sticky pool of viscous matter.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the Black Lotus Powder administered?
The drug can be administered either by injection (the powder when heated turns to liquid) or by inhalation (the black smoke given-off smells like burnt toffee).
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the victim's Sanity points while under the effect of the Black Lotus Powder?
1D4 Sanity points are lost per minute the drug is active.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the Black Lotus Powder on the victim's mental state?
The victim immediately begins to hallucinate for 1D6 minutes per dose, granting insights into the unspeakable knowledge of the Mythos.
